Set with a shirt and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable satin bow tie with an elastic strap. Shorts with detachable elastic braces, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.

Romper suit in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Sun hat with ties under the chin. Lined.
Dungaree shorts in a cotton weave with press-studs at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Elastic straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and flap leg pockets.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, one button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Chinos in a soft cotton weave containing some linen and viscose with elastication at the back of the waist, a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton satin with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
